name: DBLX
short_description:
DBLX is a multi-user, client-server relational database.
The design goals of DBLX are to produce a very small, very fast database which can be used with standard ANSI sql.
DBLX includes the server component, a command-line client, as well as client APIs for C#, MONO, and Java.
DBLX is well-documented so that you can just get the database, drop it on to your favorite system and start using it immediately.

Go to the Discussion section to read the latest on DBLX!
